CustomField.description: Number of overdue invoices in Stripe. Indicates that the customer has not been paying invoices in time and may be in jeopardy of having their account suspended
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of overdue invoices in Stripe. Indicates that the customer has not been paying invoices in time and may be in jeopardy of having their account suspended
CustomField.label: Number of Overdue Invoices
